title: Empire Art Direct Ballroom Dancers Mixed Media Iron Hand Painted Dimensional Wall Art, 48" x 32" x 2.4", Ready to Hang
features: UNIQUE HANDCRAFTED 3D METAL ART WALL DECOR - Action and romance is captured in this stunning depiction of ballroom dancers strutting their stuff on the dance floor

HIGHLY DETAILED & ONE OF A KIND - Each piece involves complex craftsmanship, cutting, modeling, welding, aging treatment, anti rust treatment, coloring, matte surface treatment, etc. These are just a few of the measures we take to make sure you have the coolest art around!

PROTECTION & INSTALLATION - Each piece is personally inspected before applying corner, bubble wrap and carton, ensuring your package arrives unharmed. Hooks installation directly on the artwork so it's easy to hang. Just open the box and it's all ready to adorn and brighten your walls!

GIFT & PERFECT DECORATION - A perfect Christmas, New Year, Thanksgiving, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine, Birthday Gift for your relatives and friends. A great piece to put center stage in your living room, bedroom, dining area, office, hotel, bar, etc.
100% GET SATISFACTION - Fast shipping, risk free for purchase. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, please contact us and we will either replace the picture or give you a full refund.
description: About EADEmpire Art Direct has a long rich history of manufacturing wall art and home furnishings since 1948.At EAD, we are proud to be creating perfect decorative products on the market.Our decorations are over 1, 000 designs, EAD has a variety of wall decorations for all moments in your life.Feature:• Item Name: Empire Art Direct Ballroom Dancers Mixed Media Iron Hand Painted Dimensional Wall Art, 48" x 32" x 2.4", Ready to Hang• Model Name: Ballroom Dancers• Color: Multi Color• Style: Industrial• Material: Metal• Technics: Each piece is inspected and certified by the artist as an original work of art • Packing: Packing with bubble wrap and protective corners in carton• Product Size & Weight: 48"L x 32"W x 2.4"D & 16.5 lbs• Package Size & Weight: 51.8"L x 36"W x 2.8"D & 20.3 lbsDecoration:Action and romance is captured in this stunning depiction of ballroom dancers strutting their stuff on the dance floor. This provocative image emanates sensual tension and the abstract style lets the viewer imagine their own storylines. Ballroom dancing is extremely popular now as it has been for over 100 years, and this mixed media sculpture expertly captures the essence of the dance. The dancers are caught in mid dip and the viewer can imagine them twirling about to the music.About returns policy and our services:If you are not satisfied with our product or order wrong item, please let us know immediately, we will offer you the best services.Check out our brand Empire Art Direct for more choices!ORDER NOW!DON'T MISS OUT, LIMITED STOCK!
